name: Display by WeScreen
description:
A simple way to display your designs inside a variety of mobile devices and share them with anyone in the world.

Simple steps:
1) Select your layer
2) Pick a device (Optional)
3) Click the "Share" button

Share your link with anyone in the world.

Other features:
- Your link will stay up for you to share a different layer.
- Your image will not change if you switch to a different device.

Note: Shared content stays available for 24 hours unless you change a link.
